mapper.insert: INSERT INTO takecourse(student_ID, course_ID, is_student) VALUES (#{student_ID}, #{course_ID}, #{is_student})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM takecourse WHERE student_ID=#{student_ID} and course_ID=#{course_ID} and is_student=#{is_student}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM takecourse WHERE student_ID=#{student_ID} and course_ID=#{course_ID}

SELECT takecourse.student_ID,name,account.email FROM (takecourse NATURAL JOIN student) JOIN account ON takecourse.student_ID=account_ID WHERE takecourse.course_ID = #{course_ID} AND takecourse.is_student=#{is_student}

WITH a AS ( SELECT student_ID, NAME, project_score, attend_score FROM student NATURAL JOIN takecourse WHERE course_ID = #{course_ID} AND is_student = "1" ), b AS ( SELECT attend_percentage, project_percentage FROM course WHERE course_ID = #{course_ID} ), c AS ( SELECT count( course_ID ) AS project_number FROM project WHERE course_ID = #{course_ID} ), d AS ( SELECT count( course_ID ) AS attend_number FROM attendance WHERE course_ID = #{course_ID} ), e AS ( SELECT * FROM a JOIN b JOIN c JOIN d ) SELECT student_ID, NAME, project_score * project_percentage * 100 /IF( project_number = 0, 1, project_number ), attend_score * attend_percentage * 100 /IF( attend_number = 0, 1, attend_number ) AS attned_score FROM e
